A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat-loving elderly neighbor, Lucy Caroline Priest (Dagmar Love), trying to keep the family from destroying an ancient Egyptian cat burial ground. In this love battle between one person's love of animals and another's hate is acted out, but also a deeper evil resides within the priest; she is eating the dead pet cats
